Description_lang: Mind Sear and Shadow Word: Pain damage has a $s1% chance to grant you Coalescing Shadows and Mind Flay has a $s2% chance to grant you Coalescing Shadows, stacking up to 3 times. Mind Blast and Mind Spike consume all Coalescing Shadows to deal $391243s1% increased damage per stack, and consuming at least 1 increases the damage of your periodic effects by $391244s1% for $391244d.
